CustomField.formula:
IF(D_B_Data_Available__c = False, IF((Common_Value__c == 'A' || Common_Value__c = 'B') && Requested_Credit_Amount__c <= Credit_Limit__c && Status__c = 'Active','Approved',IF(((Common_Value__c == 'C' && Requested_Credit_Amount__c <= Credit_Limit__c) || (Common_Value__c == 'A' || Common_Value__c = 'B')) && Status__c = 'Active','Pending','Declined')),
IF(Credit_Scorecard__c >= 7.0 && Requested_Credit_Amount__c <= Credit_Limit__c && Trade_Experiences_Count__c >= 5, 'Approved',IF(Credit_Scorecard__c >= 4.01, 'Pending','Declined')))
CustomField.label: Credit Pre-Approval Status
